p: From Hypenia salzmannii (syn. Hyptis salzmannii), a study describes the isolation of sesamin ( 134), cubebin ( 144) and hinokinin ( 145)( Messana et al., 1990). Subsequently, from the same species, hypenol ( 146), a new lignan, was identified along with the known Î²-peltatin-A methyl ether ( 147)( de Lucena et al., 2013).
